title: Maresca 'happy' at Chelsea & 'in love' with squad
subtitle: Chelsea's Enzo Maresca says he is "happy" and "falling more in love with the players", days after saying he experienced "the worst 48 hours" of his tenure.
full_text: Chelsea's Enzo Maresca says he is "happy" and "falling more in love with the players", days after saying he experienced "the worst 48 hours" of his tenure.
